sideA: Selecciona lo que está en el centro y muévelo hacia la izquierda.

sideB.text: Select the center item and move it left.
Drag the middle item to the left.
Move the item in the center to the left.
Select what is in the center, and move it to the left.
Can you select the first sentence for me?

note: ~Enchant the first sentence~ (Incorrect verb: 'enchant' means to charm or delight, like with magic. The correct verb for selecting text is 'highlight'.)

sideA: Arrastra la imagen que está a la derecha hacia la carpeta de arriba.

sideB.text: Drag the image on the right into the folder at the top.
Go ahead and drag the rightmost picture to the folder above.
Please drag the picture on the right and drop it in the top folder.
Drag the image at the right side to the top folder.

note: Pro Tip: When referring to a position on a screen, the prepositions 'on' and 'at' are often interchangeable. 'On the right' is slightly more common than 'at the right side', but both are perfectly understood.

sideA: The button, often an arrow pointing right, that takes you to the next page in your history.
note:
Forward (Adverb): In the direction that one is facing or traveling; toward the front.

In a web browser, the forward button lets you navigate to a page you have previously visited after you have used the back button.
